unsigned int lnet_kiov_t::kiov_offset

Starting offset of the fragment within the page.

Note that the end of the fragment must not pass the end of the page; i.e., kiov_len + kiov_offset <= PAGE_CACHE_SIZE.

Definition at line 494 of file types.h.
